name: Marble & Glass
description:
This is a very INCOMPLETE and WORK-IN-PROGRESS project!

I've committed to releasing something every week and as such what you're playing is a very early and unfinished build of what I'm currently working on. I'm hoping what little there is sets a nostalgic/chill mood at least.

Unfortunately it needs another day or two in the oven. I'm looking forward to writing about the week on my website. In short: I spent way too long on menu stuff this week and trying to figure out Pixel Perfect Camera with varying DPIs.

I intend to complete it to the vision I had in mind and I'll open up the comments when that time comes. While this is late for my own "game a week" effort, it's not actually late for the game jam it's intended for nor will it be.

Thanks for your patience and support 🙂
